about_the_game:
This DLC is a ASMR soundtrack that introduces the world of Radiant Victorias.
The story takes place a few days after the protagonist's homeland, Ashira, is invaded by the empire.

【Story】

A few days into their journey, the protagonist and Eleonora are forced to camp after encountering delays in their travels.
That night, the protagonist hears moans coming from Eleonora's sleeping area and upon investigating, discovers that she is masturbating.
Eleonora is embarrassed to be caught in the act, but is unable to resist continuing, becoming excited by the idea of being watched.
She confesses that she had originally planned to initiate sex in a proper setting,
and the two engage in passionate kissing and lovemaking in the missionary position.

The ASMR short drama series of this work has complete translations.
Please open the .mp4 video file at the local location.
There are SRT files available in Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, English, and Japanese.

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 20.
Content Warning! This game contains: violent content, sex acts and sexual assault.
